statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Costa Rican coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${10.80} per pound with some Gualtemala Antigua coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${14.00} per pound to create \displaystyle{50} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${10.99} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
